Posts.Content: TNIV wrote: Hi - My cancer has changed for a third time and I am now triple negative.  Will start chemo in the next two weeks.  For those TN, how long have you been on chemo?  Have you continued to work?  I did fine on chemo when I was first diagnosed, but I knew there was an end in sight to that treatment.  I was able to work.  My fear with the TN dx is that I will be on chemo forever and not able to continue to work.  Looking for thoughts from the experts!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Others who are triple negative - how long on chemo? TNIV menan
